name: pnp-sp-dev-teams-sample-microsoft-teams-apps-book-a-room
title: Book-a-room App Template
shortDescription: Book-a-room is a Microsoft Teams bot that lets users quickly find and reserve a meeting room for 30 (default), 60, or 90 minutes starting from the current time. The Book-a-room bot scopes to personal or 1:1 conversations.

name: pnp-sp-dev-teams-sample-microsoft-teams-apps-remote-support
title: Remote Support App Template
shortDescription: Remote Support is a Microsoft Teams bot that provides a focused interface between support requesters throughout your organization and the internal support team. End-users can submit, edit, or withdraw requests for support and the support team can respond, manage, and update requests all within the Teams platform.
longDescription: Remote Support is a Microsoft Teams bot that provides a focused interface between support requesters throughout your organization and the internal support team. End-users can submit, edit, or withdraw requests for support and the support team can respond, manage, and update requests all within the Teams platform.

name: pnp-sp-dev-teams-sample-microsoft-teams-apps-request-a-team
title: Request-a-team App Template
shortDescription: Request-a-team is a Microsoft Teams app that optimizes new team creation for your enterprise organization. The app supports standardization and best practices when creating new team instances through the integration of a wizard-guided request form, an embedded approval process, a request status dashboard, and automated team builds
longDescription: Request-a-team is a Microsoft Teams app that optimizes new team creation for your enterprise organization. The app supports standardization and best practices when creating new team instances through the integration of a wizard-guided request form, an embedded approval process, a request status dashboard, and automated team builds

name: pnp-sp-dev-teams-sample-microsoft-teams-apps-scrums-for-channels
title: Scrums for Channels App Template
shortDescription: Scrums for Channels is a scrum assistant app that enables users to schedule and run scrums in channels within Microsoft Teams. The app is great for remote teams and teams comprised of members from varied geographical locations and time zones.

name: pnp-sp-dev-teams-sample-microsoft-teams-apps-scrums-for-group-chat
title: Scrums for Group Chat App Template
shortDescription: Scrums for Group Chat is a supportive scrum assistant that enables group chat members to run asynchronous stand-up meetings and easily share their daily updates. It allows all members of the group chat to contribute to the scrum and view the updates made by others in the running scrum.
longDescription: Scrums for Group Chat is a supportive scrum assistant that enables group chat members to run asynchronous stand-up meetings and easily share their daily updates. name: pnp-sp-dev-teams-sample-microsoft-teams-apps-visitor-management
title: Visitor Management App Template
shortDescription: The Visitor Management app enables your organization and employees to easily and efficiently manage the on-site visitor process, directly from Microsoft Teams. The app enables employees to create visitor requests, centrally track a request status through the visitor dashboard, and receive real-time notifications when a visitor arrives.
longDescription: The Visitor Management app enables your organization and employees to easily and efficiently manage the on-site visitor process, directly from Microsoft Teams.
